[center][SIZE=4]Name of the Author of the real Sword: Brendan Olszowy.
His website is www.fableblades.com.
The link to this piece is here: http://www.fableblades.com/PeaceLily.html[/SIZE][/center]


[center][img]http://www.fableblades.com/Photos/PeaceLily/Header.jpg[/img][/center]


[img]http://picload.org/image/lpiadgi/screenshot000.png[/img]


[CENTER][IMG]http://holybibletext.com/divider.png[/IMG][/CENTER]

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Description:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

So another Fable Blades Sword big thanks to Brendon giving me permission to make a Skyrim sword after one of his epic Creations. :)

The Sword is Craftable in the Steel Section at the Forge.

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Install:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

1.Extract the archive
2.Copy the contents of the archive in your SkyrimData folder
3.Open the Skyrim launcher or your mod manager of choice and check the Peace Lily.esp

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Uninstall:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

1.Uncheck the esp plugin
2.Delete all files that came with the mod


[CENTER][IMG]http://holybibletext.com/divider.png[/IMG][/CENTER]


Do NOT modify/reupload/edit/sell any asset in this mod without my permission. Have fun!
author: standalone09
